short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert dollar prices to your local currency on Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transify provides a solution for international buyers who want to view price information on amazon.com in their local currencies. Transify currently supports the following currency conversion: KRW, CAD, EUR, and CNY.
